name.ja: スパークハーツ・アネッシュ

summoning_condition.en: If you have "Sparks" or "Curtain of Sparks" in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card from your hand face-up to your field.

requirement.en: During your Main Phase that you Normal or Special Summoned this card.

effect.en: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can add to your hand 1 FIRE Attribute Spellcaster Type monster from among the cards sent. This turn, you cannot activate the effect of "Sparkhearts Anesh".
